document_data.name: All Faiths Altar
document_data.mainbody: The '''All Faiths Altar''' was a shrine in the city of [[Loudwater]] in the [[Delimbiyr Vale]] in the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]]. It was open to worshipers of all non-evil faiths (with [[Bane]], [[Cyric]], [[Malar]], and such excluded).
document_data.Services: Poor travelers sometimes slept in the shrine's forechancel, usually when the weather was bad. However, [[pilgrim]]s and wandering priests were permitted to stay no more than a [[tenday]].
